function bubblesize(value){
     max = 1347565324;
     min = 324366;
     maxBox = 70 * 70 * 2 * Math.PI;
     minBox = 3 * 3 * 2 * Math.PI;
     box = (value - min) / (max - min) * (maxBox - minBox) + minBox;
    if (box < minBox) {
         box = minBox;
    }
    return Math.sqrt(box / (Math.PI * 2)) / 2;
}
